Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. function getLoadingGifDiv() {
return ‘‘;

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $24.99 - $16.29
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:36:56 UTC – Details)

From the manufacturer

New Sprouts Fix It!

Give your little fixer everything they need to complete pretend construction and repair jobs with New Sprouts Fix It!, one of the popular pretend play activity sets from Learning Resources!

Pretend Tools for Little Hands!

Sized for little hands, this set’s five toddler-safe tools include a pretend saw, screwdriver, hammer, wrench, and drill!

Imaginative Fix-It Adventures!

Made from chunky plastic, these pretend tools add a touch of realism to all kinds of imaginative play—the drill even makes noise!

Toolbox for Storage!

When repairs are finished for the day, all of the tools store safely inside the included tool box until the next game of pretend.

Ages & Stages

Imaginative Skills

Let imaginations soar with this toy that builds creativity and social skills through immersive role play!

Hand Strength

Give little hands the strength they need to hold a pencil, play on the playground, and more with this fun hands-on toy!

Social Skills

Kids develop social-emotional learning skills with this toy’s fun activities that support healthy emotions and communication!

Building Someone Amazing

When the toy you choose is from Learning Resources, you’re helping your child build who they will become – whether an architect, an A student, or just an all-around awesome kid!

TOY TOOLS: Little tools for big imaginary projects. Surprise your children with this toddler tool set
TODDLER-SAFE TOOLS: Encourage imaginative play with toddler-safe tools made from durable, soft plastic
TODDLER TOOLBOX INCLUDES: Includes saw, hammer, screwdriver, wrench, drill, and toolbox
REALISTIC SOUNDS: Squeeze the drill and it makes sounds
Give the Gift of Learning: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift!
Kids’ Toys for Stocking Stuffers!: From fidget toys and board games to puzzles and beyond, our screen-free learning and education toys make the perfect Christmas gifts for boys and girls!

item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 14.57 x 11.81 x 25.98 inches
Item Weight 12.38 pounds
Manufacturer STARRAY
ASIN B0BK8M2PZZ
Item model number STARRAY
Best Sellers Rank #973 in Patio, Lawn & Garden (See Top 100 in Patio, Lawn & Garden)
#26 in Outdoor Lighted Holiday Displays

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Great Christmas Decorations: Made of metal wire, the Christmas deer decorations are durable, corrosion-resistant and can withstand harsh wind and weather conditions. This set of 3 reindeer decoration outdoor yard includes a buck, a doe and a fawn in different poses, with 3D modelling and vivid poses to make the reindeer Christmas decoration look even more charming and cute, it is the perfect Christmas outdoor decorations to welcome your family.
Easy to Assemble: The deer Christmas decorations are easy to assemble without tools, as all the parts snap into place with ease. The stunning deer Christmas decorations can be completed in minutes. Each deer has an individual plug to display them individually or together.
Lighted Design: The outdoor Christmas reindeer has built-in 240 LED lights to create the perfect night display. Just simply plug in and unplug to turn the lights on and off. The lights make the outdoor Christmas reindeer extremely attractive and bring an eye-catching view to your lawn and yard.
Elegant Details: Celebrate the season with a heartwarming snapshot of a deer family, intricately designed with festive details like shining red bows and a shimmery fabric; BUCK DIMENSIONS: 24″(L) x 51″(W) x 60″(H); DOE DIMENSIONS: 22″(L) x 12″(W) x 47″(H); FAWN DIMENSIONS: 18.5″(L) x 6.3″(W) x 27.5″(H)
Perfect for Outdoor Christmas Decorations: The reindeer outdoor decorations are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations. Reindeer outdoor decorations can decorate any place, such as lawns, front porches, patios, gardens. It also makes a great Christmas gift for friends and family.

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

COOFANDY Men’s 2 Pieces Cotton Linen Set Henley Shirt Shorts Sleeve and Casual Beach Shorts Summer Yoga Outfits

ABOUT US | COOFANDY

COOFANDY as a new arising Men’s Clothing brand that is committed to provide our customers the most innovative and high quality product. The clothing types that we involved include T Shirt, Sweater, Blazer, Suit, Shirt, Pullovers, Hoodie &Sweatshirt, Sports Shorts, Yoga, Pajamas, the styles that you can think of are all found in our store. Our goal is to bring you better and convenient shopping experience.

A MORE RELAXED YOU

Relaxation is key to a healthy life, and you can’t relax unless you are comfortable. Order this lightweight set today so that you can relax no matter where you are and no matter who is around

【CASUAL 2 PIECE OUTFITS】Casual henley shirts feature solid color, v-neck, short sleeves, and side split, making you feel comfortable and stress-free. The cotton beach shorts set is designed in a casual fit, slant pockets, astretchy waist with an adjustable drawstring providing maximum comfort at the waist
【SUMMER ESSENTIALS】The 2 pieces shorts set is essential clothes in your wardrobe. Casual outfits can be worn all day at home for leisure time or can be matched with glasses sneakers, and sandals for a chic and trendy look for outside

Mens 2 Piece Athletic Set

Sports or Casual Is Up To You, COOFANDY tracksuits give you a multi-purpose look which is both casual & comfortable.

High quality cotton and poly. Lightweight,Soft Breathable and StretchyMens lightweight 2 piece sweatsuits sets can pair with a sports shoes for athletic sports in spring, summer, and autumn, or you can wear them separately. Perfect for home, sleeping, daily casual, sports, gym, running, yoga, party, exercise, fitness, cocktail, workout or traveling time in every season from winter to spring.

Features
2 Piece Sweatsuit 2-piece Tracksuits 3 Pack Gym Tank Top 3 Pack Gym Tank Top 2 Pack Men’s Shorts

Colors

Size

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 31, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BKZCXVX7

【Premium Material】 The 2-piece Tracksuits are made of a skin-friendly cotton blend, super soft, lightweight, stretchy, and breathable allowing flexible movement, and you will feel relaxed all day long
【2 Pieces Set Features】 Men’s polo shirts and shorts sets feature a muscle fit cut, a quarter zip neck, elastic ribbed cuffs ,gentle elastic waistband with workable drawstring and 2 side slant pockets providing an optimal range of motion for workouts and lounging as well
【Casual Summer 0utfits Match】Men t-shirts and shorts, pairing with sunglasses and a sun hat for a more stylish style,Or combining them together or pair them with different tops or pants for a great summer look
【OCCSSIONS】A must-have men’s 2 piece short set outfit in man’s wardrobe. Perfect for daily casual,sleeping, home, outdoor sport, gym, running, golf, yoga, fitness, workout or traveling in every season
【Note】Machine wash, US size. Perfect christmas birthday anniversary gift for your boyfriend, son and husband

Warranty & Support

Price: $47.99 - $39.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:18 UTC – Details)


Official World Chess Championship set is the set produced in plastic chess set in exactly the same design as the famous wooden Official World Chess Championship set that is used in the World Chess Championship matches and Grand Prix the most beatiful in chess sets. The weight of the chess board set is 1.2 kilos, the weighted chess pieces only is 553 grams, white and black color, best tournament chess set for your game! Unique and designed set comes with a high-quality cardboard chess board, square size is 48 mm. The chess kit is ideal for beginners, kids, adults for all chess fans. It comes in a cute small case with the themed design – cool and edgy inside and out – best chess gifts for your kids. Since 2013, the sets in this design have been exclusively used in the World Chess Championship matches and top international events. The set premiered at the famous 2013 Candidates Tournament in London where the current champion Magnus Carlsen won his ticket to the Championship Match on tie-breaks. Chess set official has a folding regulation chess board and black and white chess pieces weighted in a gift box. If you don’t have a chess set at home, there are lots of options out there, so we aimed to create the ultimate chessboard and set for home and club use that should cover all types of chess play. The box with a magnetic latch comfortably stores the pieces and the foldable. Just as it has changed the way we work and socialize, the pandemic has likely made you change the way we play chess. You, just like us, probably ditched the open tournaments and club events (even if they are happening in your area) for some online chess action. With more time at home, you are possibly playing chess a bit more than before, and using your chessboard to set up positions to be able to analyze them in 3D. One of the best chess sets portable and chess sets for beginners.
CLASSIC CHESS SET with new staunton design with chess pieces and chess board. Ideal for Christmas and birthday gift for chess lovers. Chess pieces are made of high quality ABS plastic, king height is 3’4” inches and queen height is 3’11 inches, including 2 extra queens which make this set ideal for tournament play!
UNIQUE CHESS SET for adults and kids, best chess set for travelling. This chess set repeats the design of the famous Championship chess set used in the official FIDE tournaments. The most comfortable plastic chess set to play with. The weighted chess pieces are very comfortable to hold and play your favourite game.
IDEAL CHESS GIFT – professional chess set of the Chess Championship Match. All FIDE official tournaments are plyed with this design sets. The set was designed by Pentagram Studio London specially for World Chess. Chess sets for adults unique and travelling chess set
PORTABLE CHESS SET – it is nice chess set for school and tournaments. It comes in a nice drawer box. The foldable chess board made of carton ideally fits the box. Travel chess set in a nice designed box. Chess board size is 17’68×17’68 inches with squares 1’97×1’97 inches. The knight base is 1’45 inches and extra queens which make chess set best for tournament play.
STAUNTON CHESSMEN with the modern design. The chess pieces are very well-weighted, taking into account, that this is a plastic set. The unique design of the chess pieces was created by the prominent architect Daniel Weil for championship chess matches. The pieces are the most ergonomic among the existing plastic chess pieces.

4.5
Price: $47.99 - $39.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:18 UTC – Details)
